sen.j: 上鳥羽口駅（かみとばぐちえき）は、京都府京都市伏見区竹田向代町川町にある、近畿日本鉄道近鉄京都線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Kamitobaguchi Station (Kamitobaguchi-eki), located in Takeda-Mukaidaimachikawa-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway station on the Kyoto Line of Kintetsu Corporation.
Kamitobaguchi Station (Kamitobaguchi-eki), located in Takeda-Mukaidaimachikawa-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility on the Kyoto Line of Kintetsu Corporation.
Kamitobaguchi Station, located in Takeda-Mukaidaimachikawa-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a railway facility on the Kyoto Line of Kintetsu Corporation.

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Station structure
The station's structure
Station layout
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 島式1面2線のホームの両外側に通過線のある待避可能な高架駅。
sen.e: It is an elevated station with a one-side and two-tracked island platform, and on each outside of the platform, it has a passing track that makes a train possible to wait for another train.
sen.cmt: 島式ホーム→elevated station [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]、通過線→ a passing track [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]、待避可能な（駅）→定訳不明 [列車待避→waiting for another train (出典：鉄道技術用語辞典）を参照にmakes a train possible to wait for another trainとしました]、高架駅→elevated station [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]
sen.e: It is an elevated station with a one-side, two-track island platform, and on each side of the platform it has a passing track that allows a train to wait for another.
It is an elevated station with a one-side, two-track island platform, and on each side of the platform it has a passing track that allows a train to wait for another.

sen.j: ホーム有効長は6両分。
sen.e: Effective length of the platform is 6 cars long
The platform's effective length is equal to six cars.
The platform's effective length is equal to six cars.

sen.j: 改札・コンコースは1階、ホームは2階にある。
sen.e: The ticket inspection facility and concourse are on the 1st floor and the platform is on the 2nd floor.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket inspection facility [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]、コンコース→concourse [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]
sen.e: The ticket inspection facility and concourse are on the first floor, and the platform is on the second floor.
The ticket inspection facility and concourse are on the first floor, and the platform is on the second floor.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: It has only one ticket barrier
It has only one ticket barrier.
It has only one ticket gate.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: 京都寄りに渡り線があり、異常時は折り返し運転が可能だが行われたことはない（向島駅で行う）。
sen.e: There is a crossover on the side to the direction of Kyoto, and in a time of emergency the train can double back, although it has never happened to date (normally the train shuttles at Mukojima Station).

There is a crossover on the side toward the direction of Kyoto, and in a time of emergency the train can double back, although this hasn't yet occurred (normally, the train shuttles at Mukojima Station).

There is a crossover on the side toward the direction of Kyoto, and in a time of emergency the train can double back, although this hasn't yet occurred (normally, the train shuttles at Mukojima Station).

sen.j: この渡り線は近鉄唯一のノーズ可動式となっている。
sen.e: This is the only movable nose crossing that exists on all the lines of Kintetsu Railway.
sen.cmt: ノーズ可動式→ノーズ可動クロッシング→movable nose crossing [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]
sen.e: This is the only movable nose crossing in existence throughout the Kintetsu Railway.
This is the only movable nose crossing in existence throughout the Kintetsu Railway.

sen.j: なお自動改札機は東芝製が設置されている。
sen.e: Automatic ticket gates made by Toshiba are installed.
The automatic ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.
The automatic ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.

sen.j: 赤い自動改札機（EG-2000）は出場時2枚一括処理、PiTaPa・ICOCAに対応する。
sen.e: A red colored automatic ticket gate (EC-2000) has 2-ticket processing function at outgoing ticket usage check, and accepts PiTaPa and ICOCA.
sen.cmt: 出場時→定訳不明「鉄道技術用語辞典(自動改札機の入出場検査→ticket usage check) http://yougo.rtri.org.jp/dic/をもとに、at outgoing ticket usage checkとしました]、2枚一括処理→ (2-ticket processing function [東芝文献（東芝レビュー）：http://www.toshiba.co.jp/tech/review/2000/01/f01.pdf]
sen.e: A red-colored automatic ticket gate (EC-2000) has the two-ticket processing function at the outgoing ticket usage check, and it accepts PiTaPa and ICOCA.
A red-colored automatic ticket gate (EG-2000) has the two-ticket processing function at the outgoing ticket usage check, and it accepts PiTaPa and ICOCA.

sen.j: 利用状況
sen.e: Utilization situation
Passenger usage statistics
Passenger use
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 2005年11月8日の調査結果によると、1日の利用客は7,002人。
sen.e: According to the survey made on November 8, 2005, the number of users a day was 7,002.
According to a survey conducted on November 8, 2005, the number of users was 7,002.
According to a survey conducted on November 8, 2005, the number of users was 7,002.

sen.j: 近鉄の全調査対象駅（323駅、但し調査当時の数）中、93位。
sen.e: This is the 93rd position of all the stations of Kintetsu Railway targeted by the survey (323 stations, as of the date of survey).
This is the ninety-third position of all the stations of the Kintetsu Railway targeted by the survey (323 as of the survey date).
This is the ninety-third position of all the stations of the Kintetsu Railway targeted by the survey (323 as of the survey date).

sen.j: 京都線の駅（26駅、大和西大寺駅含む）の中では、18位。
sen.e: It ranked 18th out of all the stations on the Kyoto Line (26 stations including Yamato-Saidaiji Station).
It ranked eighteenth out of all the stations on the Kyoto Line (26, including Yamato-Saidaiji Station).
It ranked eighteenth out of all the stations on the Kyoto Line (26, including Yamato-Saidaiji Station).

sen.j: 京都府内の近鉄の駅（23駅）の中では、16位。
sen.e: It ranked 16th out of all the stations of Kintetsu Railway within Kyoto City (23 stations).
It ranked sixteenth out of all the stations of the Kintetsu Railway within Kyoto City (23 stations).
It ranked sixteenth out of all the stations of the Kintetsu Railway within Kyoto City (23 stations).

sen.j: 京都府道201号中山稲荷線

Kyoto Prefectural Highway 201, Nakakyama Inari Road

sen.cmt: 道路表現を変更しました。

sen.j: 最寄停留所は、久世橋通上にある近鉄上鳥羽口駅前である。
sen.e: The nearest bus stop is Kintetsu Kamitobaguchieki-mae, which is situated on the Kuzebashi-dori Street.
The nearest bus stop is Kintetsu Kamitobaguchieki-mae, which is situated on Kuzebashi-dori Street.
The nearest bus stop is Kintetsu Kamitobaguchieki-mae, which is situated on Kuzebashi-dori Street.

sen.j: 以下の路線が乗り入れ、京都市営バスにより運行されている。
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus undertakes the operation and the following route buses are available..
sen.cmt: 京都市営バス→Kyoto City Bus [http://www.city.kyoto.jp/koho/eng/access/transport.html]
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus handles the operation, and the following route buses are available.
Kyoto City Bus handles the operation, and the following route buses are available.

sen.j: 京都市営バス横大路営業所84号系統：京都外国語大学行、京都駅行
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus Yokooji Office Route 84: Kyoto University of Foreign Studies
sen.cmt: 京都外国語大学→Kyoto University of Foreign Studies [http://www.kufs.ac.jp/kufs_new/english/english_fr.html]
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus, Yokooji Office, Route 84: Kyoto University of Foreign Studies
Kyoto City Bus, Yokooji Office, Route 84: Kyoto University of Foreign Studies, Kyoto Station
sen.cmt: 京都駅 を追加しました。

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1940年（昭和15年）4月5日 奈良電気鉄道の駅として開業。
sen.e: April 5, 1940: It was inaugurated as a station of Nara Electric Railway
sen.cmt: 奈良電気鉄道→Nara Electric Railway [http://www.fundinguniverse.com/company-histories/KINKI-NIPPON-RAILWAY-COMPANY-LTD-Company-History.html]
sen.e: April 5, 1940: It was inaugurated as a station of the Nara Electric Railway.
April 5, 1940: It was inaugurated as a station of the Nara Electric Railway.

sen.j: 相対式2面2線の地平駅。
sen.e: It is a ground station with two-sided and two-tracked opposite platforms.
sen.cmt: 相対式（ホーム）→opposite platforms [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]、地平駅→ground station [http://yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/]
sen.e: It's a ground station with opposing two-sided, two-track platforms.
It was a ground station with two separate platforms serving two tracks between them.
sen.cmt: ホームの表現を変更しました。

sen.j: 1963年（昭和38年）10月1日 会社合併により、近畿日本鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: October 1, 1963: With the merger of the company, it became a station of Kintetsu Railway
October 1, 1963: It became a station of Kintetsu Railway due to the company's merger.
October 1, 1963: It became a station of Kintetsu Railway due to the company's merger.

sen.j: 1999年（平成11年）11月27日 竹田～東寺間の連続立体化により、高架化される。
sen.e: November 27, 1999: it was elevated, following the consecutive replacement of crossings to those with an overpass or underpass in the section between Takeda Station and Toji Station.
sen.cmt: 連続立体化→定訳不明 [複数の立体交差化と考え、consecutive replacement of the crossings to those with an overpass or underpassとしました。「立体交差」は英辞郎 on the WEB 参照]
sen.e: November 27, 1999: It was elevated following the consecutive replacement of crossings to those with an overpass or an underpass in the section between Takeda Station and Toji Station.
November 27, 1999: It was elevated following the consecutive replacement of crossings to those with an overpass or an underpass in the section between Takeda Station and Toji Station.

sen.j: 4線に増線、待避可能となる。
sen.e: The number of track was increased to 4, and that enabled the train to refuge (to wait for another train).
sen.cmt: 待避可能→定訳不明 [鉄道技術用語辞典: ｈｔｔｐ.//www.yougo.rtri.or.jp/dic/ の見出し語「列車待避 (waiting for another train)」を参照にenable the train to refuge (to wait for another train)としました]
sen.e: The number of tracks was increased to four, which enabled the train to take refuge (wait for another train).
The number of tracks was increased to four, which enabled the train to take refuge (wait for another train).

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: April 1, 2007: PiTaPa started to be accepted at the station.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted at the station.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa became accepted at the station.
